author: Nolan D. McCaskill
title: Mayors look to each other, not Trump, on coronavirus response
description: Local leaders in the nation's emerging hotspots are scrambling to avoid becoming the next New York.
content:
Some city leaders arent holding their breath. Citing the legacy of Hurricane Katrina, Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms has told her staff, God bless the child whos got his own.
We have taken a lot of steps not knowing what the federal government would do b… [+4603 chars]
